components.description: The heart-shaped twist of a hard or soft golden-brown pretzel, seasoned with grains of salt. A snack commonly associated with Germany.
components.title: Pretzel

title: Pretzel

version.description:
Unicode 10.0 is the version of the Unicode Standard released on June 20, 2017. 8,518 new characters were included with this update, of which 56 were emoji characters.

Only new emoji code points are listed on this page. For the full 2017 emoji list; see Emoji 5.0 which included all 239 emoji additions including sequences for skin tone and gender.

apple_vendor_description: The pretzel emoji on Apple devices is a tempting treat, rendered with a golden-brown hue and a satisfyingly chewy texture. Apple's design language imbues it with glossy 3D shading and realistic lighting, making the twisted dough appear almost edible. Its soft rounded edges and gentle curves evoke a sense of comfort and simple pleasure, perfect for conveying cravings, snacks, or a lighthearted moment of indulgence in messages.
